completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith with 1 part: web (React 19.2.4 PWA + Vite 7.3.1 + Supabase 2.93.3 + Zustand 5.0.11 + Tailwind 4.1.17 + Zod 4.3.6)

Found 180+ existing doc sources: CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, tests/README.md, PRD (11 shards), Architecture (5), UX Design (11), Epics (8), 5 story implementation artifacts (~30 files), test design docs, TEA docs (~25), CI workflows (7), 12 SQL migrations, previous docs (90 files in 8 sections)
Tech stack: React 19.2.4 + TS 5.9.3 + Vite 7.3.1 + Zustand 5.0.11 + Supabase 2.93.3 + Tailwind 4.1.17 + Zod 4.3.6 + Vitest 4.0.17 + Playwright 1.58.2

4 parallel agents completed: Agent A (architecture+state+source-tree: 33 files), Agent B (api-reference+data-models: 25 files), Agent C (component-inventory: 9 files), Agent D (project-overview+dev-guide: 24 files updated/verified)
Master index.md rewritten with all corrected file paths across 8 documentation sections
Validation: No '(To be generated)' markers found. Fixed 7 broken links in data-models/index.md and table-of-contents.md where file names did not match actual files on disk
Finalized. 95 markdown files, ~12,800 lines across 8 sections + performance + root

findings.project_classification: monolith, 1 part, React 19 + TypeScript 5.9 + Vite 7.3 + Supabase
